extends Grabbable
    The ammo class represents a box of ammunition cubes

      • Ammo

        public Ammo(java.lang.Integer redAmount,
            java.lang.Integer blueAmount,
            java.lang.Integer yellowAmount)
        Parameters:
        redAmount - The amount of red ammunition cubes in the ammo box
        blueAmount - The amount of blue ammunition cubes in the ammo box
        yellowAmount - The amount of yellow ammunition cubes in the ammo box

    • Method Detail

      • compare

        public static int compare(Ammo set,
                          Ammo reference)
        Parameters:
        set - the ammo to be compared
        reference - the comparison reference
        Returns:
        1 if set contains the same amount or more than reference, 0 if set contains less ammo cubes of any colour than reference
